title: Swamp lizard (Hunter)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The swamp lizard is a salamander that players can capture with the Hunter skill at level 29 or above, granting 152 Hunter experience.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Green salamander (Hunter)
Swamp lizard
Released21 November 2006 (Update)
Combat level29
MembersYes
LocationNorthern Morytania
ExamineVery slimy and generally disgusting.
Advanced data
NPC ID2906

The swamp lizard is a salamander that players can capture with the Hunter skill at level 29 or above, granting 152 Hunter experience.

Contents

  • 1 Location
  • 2 Hunter info
  • 3 Hunting technique
    • 3.1 Multiple traps
  • 4 Uses
  • 5 References

Canifis Hunter areaN/A12Maplink
North-west of SlepeN/A23Maplink
  • Note that ghasts may be able to attack the player depending on trapping location. The westernmost trapping location is almost completely safe from ghasts.

Hunting technique[edit | edit source]

A player alching between catches.

The hunting technique is the same as for other salamanders. Players must bring at least one rope and small fishing net for each net trap they plan to set up. Clicking on a young tree will set the trap. The net and rope are retrieved on catching a lizard or dropped onto the ground on failing to do so, so players can use the same rope and net repeatedly.

When using 3 traps at the same time, requiring a Hunter level of 40, one may expect an hourly experience rate of 30k with decent concentration. Depending on efficiency, the rate may rise up to 35k/h. Only the north-western spot is free of ghasts.

Players may find it useful to bring alchs or stackable fletching supplies to gain experience between catches.

Multiple traps[edit | edit source]

Net trapping can be done with multiple traps at once, with the maximum amount of traps depending on the player's Hunter level.

Traps
1 1
20 2
40 3
60 4
80 5

Uses[edit | edit source]

The swamp lizard is a two handed weapon. It requires a level of 30 Ranged, Magic and Attack to wield. To be operated, the swamp lizard requires its requisite fuel, guam tar.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 23 March 2022. (Archived from the original on 23 March 2022.) Mod Ash: "Green: 20% - 141% Orange : 6% - 113% Red: 0% - 94% Black: 0% - 83%"

==Hunting technique==
[[File:Swamp Lizard Alching.png|thumb|A player alching between catches.]]
The hunting technique is the same as for other [[salamander]]s. Players must bring at least one [[rope]] and [[small fishing net]] for each [[net trap]] they plan to set up. Clicking on a [[young tree]] will set the trap. The net and rope are retrieved on catching a lizard or dropped onto the ground on failing to do so, so players can use the same rope and net repeatedly.

When using 3 traps at the same time, requiring a Hunter level of 40, one may expect an hourly experience rate of 30k with decent concentration. Depending on efficiency, the rate may rise up to 35k/h. Only the north-western spot is free of [[Ghast|ghasts]].

Players may find it useful to bring [[High Level Alchemy|alchs]] or [[Fletching training#Zero time methods|stackable fletching supplies]] to gain experience between catches. 

===Multiple traps===
Net trapping can be done with multiple traps at once, with the maximum amount of traps depending on the player's Hunter level.

==Uses==
The swamp lizard is a two handed weapon. It requires a level of 30 [[Ranged]], [[Magic]] and [[Attack]] to wield. To be operated, the swamp lizard requires its requisite fuel, [[guam tar]].
